pull.title: qa: Log as utf-8
pull.body: Explicitly read and write the log files with utf-8 as encoding

qa: Log as utf-8

events.body:
obvious utACK fa8071a0985700a4641ce77dac2cb2fa285d3afe
this would be one thing for which it'd make sense to have a linter: we really want to open *all* text files as explicitly utf-8 to avoid potential issues on the BSDs (where the locale is not always set).
@laanwj Always ping me if you want a linter :-)  I'll look in to it!

issue.title: Add linter: Make sure we explicitly open all text files using UTF-8 encoding in Python
issue.body:
Add linter: Make sure we explicitly open all text files using UTF-8 encoding in Python.

As requested by @laanwj in #13440.
